content:
The character has a degree of control over where his melee
attacks land. When determining hit location for a melee
attack, the character may use the dice as rolled, or he may
reverse them, choosing the preferred location. For example, if
Cassus rolls a 37 to hit a Chaos Heretic, this would ordinarily
strike the Right Leg. However, since he has the Sure Strike
talent, he could choose to hit the Body (37).
